website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you want a mid-level model that's packed with features and you won't miss the advanced power of some of its pricier competitors.
pros: A budget-friendly choice with impressive features including 3-position handle, LED light and base flashlight, easy-to-use reverse switch, and adjustable torque
cons: May not drive screws all the way into tough materials
Subpar USB charger that takes a while for a full charge

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and long lasting portable cordless screwdriver drill.
customer_reviews.text: The TACKLIFE cordless screwdriver drill is very powerful and long lasting. It has a lot of torque for its size. I also like the addition of the bright LEDs that turn on when you press the trigger and the bit set that comes with it. It also has a bright flashlight on the bottom of the handle. I've used the TACKLIFE cordless screwdriver drill for driving screws throw aluminum and drywall with ease. Also, I use the drills low torque settings for removing delicate computer screws when I'm repairing or upgrading PC systems.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron7

customer_reviews.title: Cordless screwdriver with a lot of torque
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this little cordless screwdriver. I’ve used cordless screwdrivers in the past and we’re not very powerful but this TACKLIFE screwdriver has a lot of torque and draws screws in with some power. I love that you can use it like a screw gun or push the button and open it up straight. It has 3 different positions. And it comes with a bunch of bits in a case which is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little dual-position driver. I've been looking for one of these rechargeable drivers, and after reading the reviews, decided on this one. I'm glad I did. It is ready to use, out of the box. It is well-made, durable and comes with nice extras. The only thing I wish they included was a case or bag, but I can find something that will work. I like the versatility of this tool, and love that it stays charged, so it's ready to use when you need it. So far, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice tool but :
customer_reviews.text: I think most would be happy with this tool. Bit the barrel is a quite large diameter. The overall size was larger then I perceived in the photos. I wanted to keep this in the kitchen drawer. The LED lights are very good and torque control works for most smaller screws. So, overall a pretty nice driver. I wanted a more compact tool so I went with the WORX WX270L 8V Cordless Impact Forcedriver. This is a little "Beast" due to the impactor technology and more compact as well. It's $10 more but it fits in the average countertop drawer and will drive virtually and screw you throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh... just OK.
customer_reviews.text: The motor is strong enough, the features are generally good, but there are two aspects that decrease its usefulness: (1) the LED lights are crummy - they're really blue and dim (like from the year 2010), and the flashlight part is pretty close to useless, (2) all of the Li cells are in the forward section of the tool (not the handle), making it very awkward and uncomfortable to use for any length of time. I can't attest to battery life, but the construction seems to be solid. The clutch is a nice feature, but it seems to be very "tight". (even at the lowest setting, it doesn't slip). All in all, good but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: IAmNotTheDroid

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap driver, but it won't drive hard screws
customer_reviews.text: The TACKLIFE electric driver is a nice unit, and the price is right. I bought an additional set of socket drivers for it. There are a couple of weak points: * The speed is fixed. You can't slow down as screw reaches full depth. * Even with the clutch set to the highest level, it starts slipping (clicking) on screws that require good force. I'm talking about a 1" # 8 screw into pine -- not a #12 into oak. It's easy to finish the task with a screwdriver, but it ought to have enough force for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Drill works good. Battery life is great. Light is very handy. Bit set it comes with is very handy but quickly oxidizes and started rusting.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was moving into a new house. I painted all the walls and, of course, had to remove and replace all the light switch plates and plug plates. This made that job so easy. It has a light on both ends- the screwdriver end and the handle end. This comes in very handy when I dropped a screw. I like the rechargeable capability of this. It fits the same charger as my phone. I like that it comes with a large variety of bits so I have the bit that I need for the job. Again, I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Lots of torque
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this screwdriver. So much torque I used it to finish my deck boards using 3 inch Deck screws! Surprised how powerful this small driver is. It also has a light which came in very handy when we had power cut for over a week. Left light on all night and hardly used any power. Charged very quickly in car charger. Normal use It charges pretty fast, battery life is good, but under heavy use needed to charge it after 10 mins but saved me getting the drill out. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: dwer

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times so I can't speak to the battery life except to say it holds a charge when not in use. Otherwise, it works great for the occasional convenience purposes I bought it for. Not fast, but powerful enough to drive in wood screws. Cons: the flashlight feature in the handle is laughably weak. There is no torque limiter/ adjustment, but still good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much, but what time I have used it, I like it very much. You really can't beat this screwdriver for the price. The only thing it doesn't have that I wish it did, is a rubber grip.. the handle is made of fairly smooth plastic, the rubber grip would have made this tool almost perfect. Seems to have plenty of torque for most every day jobs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom light is worthless and the front light is useless. The front light will only come on after the keyless chuck is engaged (spinning). Unless you get really lucky it is usually not possible to put a spinning bit into the screw head. So if you are working in an area where you need more light to see the screw head you will need another light source. The light coming on only after the chuck is spinning is a moronic design flaw. The power also seemed very weak even for a 3.6 volt.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: good to have
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice and the angle makes it easier to screw. Wish it has a carry case, then it's perfect. Love the rechargeable feature. Quick charge after use, then I know I can use next time. Will see how long the charge will hold without using.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap that's the point
customer_reviews.text: Yes of course if you're a professional you're going to kill this thing in a day; it's mostly made of plastic and needs to be recharged at the end of even a moderate workday. But for a homeowner or hobbyist with more screws than wrist strength, this lil' feller is a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Erik C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: An amazing tool. I have bought 2 now. 1 is my personal tool for the house and the 2nd is for my business work. I rely on them heavily and they do a great job. The included bits are nice and functional, but I would prefer them be magnetic tips. The driver motor has held up well for doing things like screws in a computer case and even for hinges on closet doors.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: this  works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for over a year now. I've used it during my latest move where I've had to disassemble various shelves, beds, & desks, the built in light and USB charging makes it super handy. the only thing I see missing is a built in bit holder for the most common bits used. all in all this is one my most commonly used tools in my house.
customer_reviews.author: mr Marbles

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company stands behind it.
customer_reviews.text: would highly recommend screw driver, very handy and well worth the price. Additionally, the seller stands behind the product 100%. Buy with confidence, and once again, I love the screw driver, and the lights on it, and all the bits it came with. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BozX

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little drill.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little drill. It’s more powerful than I expected. I wanted a drill for small projects and this is perfect. The USB cable makes it easier for me to charge it in any USB charger that I have. The light is very bright as well.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Mine just stopped working after a year and a half. The backend flashlight works and it is charged but the screwdriver light doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice portable screwbriver
customer_reviews.text: This screwdriver works really well and has enough torque to undo really tightened screws. For some reason my screw head case came With the text rubbed off, a minor concern for me but it made me feel like it was an used product. Aside from that I would recommend this to anyone who’d prefer a compact cordless screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect tool we needed for quick jobs around the house. Not for big jobs but little jobs where you would typically use a screwdriver. Quality is good. Looks like it will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: NDHaberman

customer_reviews.title: Durable, handy,price effective!!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this lil gadget!🙃 So very handy for in/out of homestead, for screwin to hang pics, decor shelving & assist in replacement of heater vents. & so much more, aides in bathroom bars, & outdoors for brackets, lights fixtures, & it endless uses , it's so durable & lightweight, great for getting into tight hard to reach areas! Fantastic! Well worth the cost & a great deal @that!! Highly recommend for anyone in homes, apts, or even small businesses!! Thanks amazon for another GREAT BUY!!!😎🤑
customer_reviews.author: Renee hubka

customer_reviews.title: Two DoA
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two and both were dead out of the box. I tried different chargers and cables with no success. I opted to get two replacements instead of a refund. I hope the next two will work. Currently, I'm not a fan of the TACKLIFE brand. Update: The manufacturer took it upon themselves to contact me. I was pleasantly surprised that they offered to correct the order. After all, I ended up with two working screwdrivers. Also, my faith in the TACKLIFE brand has been restored thanks to their prompt customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Great little thing!
customer_reviews.text: This apis a great little power drill. Especially if you only want a small thing for small house projects. One thing to note though is that the power is not that high, so things like drilling through wood or metal pieces is not advisable. But other than that this is very versatile. *side note look how cute my little one likes his new perches! So cute!*
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an item I never knew I needed. It’s great! Comes with so many bits and saves so much time!! I wish I would have bought one of these yearrrrrs ago. Also has a flashlight on the end! Bends from a traditional gun shape to a long shape.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mom

customer_reviews.title: Died immediately upon use. Maybe it’s a lemon?
customer_reviews.text: I am sending this back after ONE attempted use. It simply does not work. Love the design and looked forward to having for many years just like the B&D driver it’s replacing. This thing died about 5 mins into the job. I’m returning it for a replacement. Maybe I just got a lemon. If the next one does the same thing, it’s going back permanently
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great little screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Having both the light when using and the optional flashlight on the handle is great. The head kit it comes with has lots of options. The directional buttons are a little awkwardly placed... sometimes I accidentally press one when holding the handle and have to reset it to the correct position. Once you figure out a good grip it’s not a big deal. Only complaint is you kind of have to use the extender piece before attaching the bit, because if you use just the bit it snaps in very tightly and is quite hard to remove. All in all, 4.8/5. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: LL13

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: fits in your hand well, like the swivel handle. The torque settings are great if you don't want to over torque small screws. It is used mainly to install cameras and it is great battery lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: cebeze

customer_reviews.title: Not built well
customer_reviews.text: Trigger was very touchy...I would be using it it would stop and if I used my finger to jiggle trigger it would start working. I know it wasn’t expensive but I thought it could have been a little better. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: William Ferra

customer_reviews.title: Great tool eith all the attachments
customer_reviews.text: This little tool was less expensive dice than many of larger brands names and came with a full set different bits thst can solve any job. Lightweight and lots of battery life. Also has a light which is a bonus for seeing those hard to reach areas. Set up daughters bed in no time. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool
customer_reviews.text: This screwdriver is easy to use. It is very handy for small jobs around the house. It is light weight, and easy to handle. The cost for this item was perfect. I loved keeping myself busy with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent screwdriver with one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver is powerful, compact, lightweight. However, the bit socket is so tight, getting the bits in and out require a set of pliers. I am still on the fence on whether to return or not.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool for Daily Use
customer_reviews.text: Besides my precision electric screwdriver, It is my daily tool for the big toys and equipment. It is only missing a flexible extension for the tiny hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Hamad E. Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: It’s stop working less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought it last year. It had stopped working. I only used a couple of times and no longer charge.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad screwdriver. My only complaint is, battery input that is integrated in handle of screwdriver, came to me bent. I now have to use a rubber band to keep plug into jack while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Buck H

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price but low torque
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put together toys and simple builds. The selection of attachments that come with it are really useful. The only thing holding it back from a 5 star review would be I wish it had a little more torque. Overall it is a really nice little drill to keep in your kitchen and great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Good powered screwdriver with plenty of screw bits
customer_reviews.text: Nice powered screwdriver. It comes with plenty of screw bits and the charge last a couple weeks with my usage. The only thing I would change is the charging port from Micro USB to USB Type C.
customer_reviews.author: sockmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great value tool
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and at a great price. The torque limiter really helps on delicate jobs like pc building or ikea furniture. My only gripe is there is no way to turn on the front light without starting to screw. This would be great In dark spaces, just add a small switch like the handle has.
customer_reviews.author: Aniello DiSpigna

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Love the small yet effective tool. Charge lasts forever! Worked all day with it and threw it back on the charger that night it was recharged in minutes
customer_reviews.author: Brodey33

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: Like all but flashlight on bottom of handle....doubt very useful. Well-constructed and durable. I like the case for attachments, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not 5 star
customer_reviews.text: The drivers fall right off when you’re using the tool downwards. Or the bit comes off and stays stuck in the screw. Terrible cheap design.
customer_reviews.author: Justask

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Driver
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working like I hoped it would. Lightweight but strong on the screws. When using it, it doesn't sound like it is going to do the job but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Giveaway Gator

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: This electric screwdriver works great. It is very easy to use and comfortable to hold while you are using it. The battery lasts a long time and I have already used it all over my house.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

customer_reviews.title: How the durability will be for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon wants reviews on new items received. It is great ask for a review; however, you can not do an proper review until the product has bested for a period. So first use has been good so ask me again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Dovo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it lightly. All good. Use it at the lowest clutch setting. Clutch is so useful to not ruin ur device. Haven't tested the battery life or in dark tight places. Noticed it doesn't have a hex bit in the kit. Why why? So many ikea furniture uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomba

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect little tool for putting together cabinet doors and lots of small projects. Love it and holds the charge beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Streit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Home Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the tool at home for almost all tasks that require drilling holes or drivihg nuts and screws but it could be comparable to a much expensive brand that is for everyday work use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow up review. Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I returned product as it was broken out of box. TACKLIFE got in touch with me and sent me a replacement free of charge. Works great after initial use. I will definitely purchase from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Emery

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great tool and comes with multiple bits. Uses micro USB so you can charge it easily and has multiple speeds. The only downside it the forward light. The forward light will only come on once you start the drill process. Pretty pointless if you're working in a dark area and you can't see in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: Maly Lim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've never operated a cordless screwdriver so I was a bit apprehensive. However this screwdriver was easy to use. Plus it came with several attachments in a handy organized case. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased 6 more for the group of guys I work with. Best power screw driver ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy Tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for work purpose. Great easy to handle and very light to use. Definitely helped me with my everyday task at work. However reason why I am giving it a 3 star is because the bits are not magnetized so the screws fall after removal. Another problem I am having with this product is that the bit extender is very loose on the screwdriver itself, so it sometimes just falls off, or when pulling away from screwing things it comes off.
customer_reviews.author: RetroCharles

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I received the screwdriver and it would not turn on and had to return. I received the 2nd screwdriver and it worked perfectly. I have already used it several times and am very pleased with how light and easy it is to use. The battery has not died out yet. It is a great screwdriver for getting small things done around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for household jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for small projects where a big tool is not necessary. Great for build box furniture. Good grip and ease of use. Glad I bought. Light is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: pb4953

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Works good for not being a name brand. Bits break easy if using on a tough job. Or around the house use it's been great. Even caught my husband using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good cordless screwdriver. I mostly use it to raise and lower my standing desk but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Effective
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I wished the driver light came on half way through the trigger pull, instead of only when the drill is engaged.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Lapp

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: For the price? Yes it’s awesome and comes with a bit set that makes the deal even better.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bichler

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless screwdriver to have in your toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: This is great to use instead of a screwdriver or drill for little jobs around the house. I love the light and the torque on this thing. Works great for me. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie

customer_reviews.title: Dad approved
customer_reviews.text: My dad and step dad both could not stop talking about how much they loved there new drills. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: This is going to live in my craft room.
customer_reviews.text: This made installing a ceiling fan much easier. The light shines right where you need it. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile tool
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely surprised with how often I use this tool. It is very versatile, made of high quality materials, and has a great battery life. I purchased a second one as a gift for my father because of how much I’ve enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for every day jobs that would typically be reserved for a standard screwdriver. 30 attachments that make finding the correct bit a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cyril

customer_reviews.title: I cant see myself screwing with my hands anymore
customer_reviews.text: Love it, stronger than what i was expecting, the battery life is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Antonio Acevedo Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Good for small screws in soft wood.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have much power. And resistance and it won't turn. Especially towards the end of screwing in.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Souza

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I received the first order and the product did not work at all, so I returned it and received a replacement. I opened the box and the second one didn’t work either! Amazon said that they would refund my money and I could keep the replacement even though it didn’t work. Still haven’t received a refund and am now stuck with a useless product. I would give it zero stars if I could. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Never again

customer_reviews.title: Great little screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Works great for quick little jobs. I bought this for work and so far its been great and saved me a lot of time
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P

customer_reviews.title: very weak tool.
customer_reviews.text: even after a full charge ,so weak wont even drive a screw in to a predrilled hole.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mcdavid

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a battery operated screw driver light weight and easy to use and this was it.
customer_reviews.author: Toye

customer_reviews.title: Household essential
customer_reviews.text: The first set we bought about 2 years ago died completely because of the battery, couldn’t be recharged anymore. So far so good with this set, and it’s quite sturdy. Household essential, you can’t go wrong with it. Just hope this time the battery can last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase that will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use around the house. This was a great purchase. The screwdriver holds a great charge and is a great weat in you hand. Having the lights are a great addition. Also the torque, battery life, weight, and front light are all well worth the purchase. I was moved by the quality for the price cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: eL

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: not very powerful, need for small jobs without using drill
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for those handyman repairs. Powerful and has torque adjustments. LED light at drive/screw head a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: SteveinSC

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good little screwdriver for light jobs, but trigger is cheap. The plastic trigger hangs up when you push it in.
customer_reviews.author: Grif

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all uses
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is compact, easy to use. Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty

customer_reviews.title: Use as intended to be happy
customer_reviews.text: This is for household duties like hanging pictures taking apart toys or appliances. This is not gonna put a lag bolt into a 4x4 or undo the light nuts on your car. Small helpful handy household screw driver. Great for putting together Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: very nice and light weight. Bought for girlfriend and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kalosky

customer_reviews.title: Good value screwdriver.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box, but it’s better to charge it before it’s first use. The lights are a nice little feature, but the best feature is definitely its ability to adjust. It’s a really good screwdriver, and you probably shouldn’t consider this any kind of drill replacement. Very pleased, even bought a second one for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: Jaben Calas

customer_reviews.title: A must have for light weight repairs!
customer_reviews.text: I use this drill as a side companion with my more powerful drills. This is a must have for the light weight jobs around the house. You won't be stripping any screws with this drill/electric screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This was very disappointing for me. First time I used it it did not have enough torque to "break" the screw loose. It is handy around the house for light jobs
customer_reviews.author: Tina Juzwik

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Good for having this handy around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Naushad Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My husband was super impressed with this. I purchased a second one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: This screwdriver has been awesome! Makes tedious tasks a breeze, stand by battery is pretty great too.
customer_reviews.author: Tré Voltz

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners toolsmen
customer_reviews.text: I love this screwdriver! Literally a life saver went it comes to building ikea stuff and computer parts. The bit case has a wide variety to choose from for the right job too.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjiv Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great only complaint is the lights are not very bright
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Good battery and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and decent battery life, wish it just had a little more torque
customer_reviews.author: Justin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's a gift...
customer_reviews.text: Hope it works, it's a gift. But looks like junk.
customer_reviews.author: NanaColleen

customer_reviews.title: Limited to hand right
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver is easy to use but does not provide enough strength to screw in screws into wood.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for jobs around the house. Charges with USB. Lots of attachments.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Lots of bits!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it, this isn’t going to have the torque a drill/screw gun will have. But for small chores around the house it’s perfect. Not to mention all the bits that you get!
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Lake Placid, FL

customer_reviews.title: A handy, strong and lightweight tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy tool with surprising strength. The light is handy for working in dark and the variety of bits included in the kit are very useful. It is lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Very good, exactly what I was looking for. Durable, easy to charge. The included bits are fine, but not awesome. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a small screw gun to keep in the home toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it's so convenient. No it's not the same power of a drill so don't purchase it with that expectation, but you can also hand tighten.
customer_reviews.author: ADONIS HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool for around the house. Don’t overtax as it’s not a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Phil R

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the convenience! Light weight too. One charge lasts for a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Frequently used
customer_reviews.text: I use this driver all the time mainly to take apart dash hardware. Works good nice battery life.
customer_reviews.author: marks

customer_reviews.title: my go-to tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim. Love it. Being a female, I have used this time and time again on the assembly of many items. Love that it has the flashlight, has a reverse option, and so many drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for simple projects
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and light weight. This is a must if you’re living on your own and just want a few tools in case if you come across an IKEA assembly project. Definitely not for heavy duty use or big projects, but definitely worth it!! Does not feel cheap either.
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the money. Kidnve weak. But I wanted it to be more gentle than a normal drill...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: TACKLIFE Cordless Screwdriver, 3.6V 2.0Ah Electric Screwdriver Rechargeable, Adjustable 3 Position Handle, 31pcs Screwdriver Bits, 6 Torque Setting, 1 N.m to 4 N.m, Front&Rear Light, SDH13DC
feature_bullets: ☛【6 TORQUE SETTING + 90° ROTATION HANDLE 】TACKLIFE SDH13DC power screwdriver cordless has an adjustable torque ring with 6 setting (torque output from 1 N.m to 4 N.m) and a 3-position choice (90°-180°) handle, 90° as pistol grip, 140° for tighter workspace and 180° as a straight screwdriver; giving better performance than others on the market, you could adjust the torque and handle angle for different projects to avoid stripping screws and prevent overpowering when delicate fasteners.

☛【2000mAh LITHIUM BATTERY + EASY CHARGING】Higher Quality 2000mAh Battery means longer lifetime and unbeatable battery run time. It can screw at least 400 screws after fully charged. With micro-USB cable, you can use rechargeable power bank, mobile phone charger, or computer charging port to charge anytime and anywhere, saving your precious time.

☛【1/4'' QUICK CHANGE CHUCK + F/R SWITCH】The electric screwdriver is designed with a 1/4 inches (6.35mm) hex, you can change screwdriver bits quickly and accurately, it's an ideal choice for finishing all tasks including hanging pictures, fixing cabinets, furniture, etc.And the forward and reverse switch makes screw driving or screw removing easily, you could even use it with one hand.

💡【FRONT LIGHT + REAR LIGHT 】Front Light: 4 LED lights form a circular light band, which is brighter than those have only 2 LED lights, and it will automatically light up when the start button is pressed. The larger area of illumination can increase the safety of working compared with other screwdriver with a small light. Rear Light:the rear LED light has a separate on/off button, you can use it as a flashlight in daily life.

☛【31PCS ACCESSORIES】- 31pcs accessories including 5pcs Phillips Bit, 5pcs Slotted/Flathead Bits, 5pcs Pozidriv Bits, 10pcs Star/Torx Bits bits, 5pcs Squeare, 1pc 60mm Extension Attachment, give you convenient and practical screw-driving experience for various projects all over the house. You can assemble furniture, install blinds, and decorative a room-- all with only one powerful tool and rich accessories.
